Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1981...
Injured on 6/16/1982 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Traded from San Francisco to Baltimore on 7/31/1982 (Going to SF: 1B B. Horner. Going to BAL: 3B H. Matsunaga, CF M. Jordan)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1984, off Joe Sambito (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/10/1984, off Mike Flanagan (OAK)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1984, hitting .542 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1984, hitting .294 with 12 HR, 75 RBI...
Injured on 6/9/1986 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1986, hitting .462 with 3 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1986, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1986, hitting .533 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 9/16/1987...
Injured on 9/17/1987 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/24/1988 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Had 6 hits with 6 RBI against Cleveland on 4/20/1989...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/12/1992 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against New York (A) on 5/15/1992...
Traded from Baltimore to Chicago (N) on 6/23/1992 (Going to CHC: 3B H. Matsunaga, P T. Candiotti. Going to BAL: LF H. Rodriguez, P D. Lowe)...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Baltimore on 1/31/1995 (Going to CHC: RF M. Ordonez, 1B B. Fullmer, P D. Lowe, CF D. Roberts. Going to BAL: P D. Wells, RF G. Sheffield, CF J. Gonzalez, 3B H. Matsunaga).
..
Had 2000th career hit on 6/4/1998, off Jose Melendez (CLE)...
